translation.en: I got you, Sensei. Stay with me.
You're a life saver, Casey Jones.
I learned from the best. Come on, we're almost there.
translation.es: Aprendí del mejor. Vamos, casi llegamos.

translation.en: Bad doggies!
Impeccable timing, little brother. Very dramatic.
translation.es: En el momento justo, hermano. Muy dramático.

translation.en: Help him, Michelangelo. He's hurt bad.
That's it. The resistance failed. The Krang won.
translation.es: La resistencia falló. Los Krang ganaron.

translation.en: But… but it isn't over.
We've still got a ninja's greatest weapon…
hope.
That and a badass mystic warrior.
translation.es: Eso y un guerrero místico rudo.

translation.en: Mikey, we need a time gateway.
It'll take everything I have.
I know, but this is our last chance.
translation.es: Sí, pero es nuestra última oportunidad.

translation.en: It's our only chance.
- Wait, what's going on? Where is he going? - Casey, listen.
The Krang first came to our planet through a mystic doorway.
translation.es: Los Krang llegaron por un portal místico.

translation.en: The key that opened the doorway looked like this.
translation.es: La llave que lo abrió se veía así.

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
Because Mikey's about to send you back in time to the day that the key was stolen.
translation.es: Mikey está por enviarte al pasado, al día en que la robaron.

translation.en: Wait, he's gonna what?
The people who stole that key opened the doorway for the Krang.
translation.es: La gente que la robó abrió el portal a los Krang.

translation.en: You have to find it before that happens.
Find the key, stop the Krang.
- But, Sensei-- - Say it!
Find the key, stop the Krang.
I don't want to lose you.
Casey, it's not about me.
translation.es: Casey, no se trata de mí.

translation.en: They found us!
Mikey!
Master Michelangelo, no! You're gonna--
Casey…
when you're done saving the world, do me a favor.
translation.es: cuando salves el mundo, hazme un favor.

translation.en: Grab a slice!
- - Where…
I made it?
All right, Casey, here we go. Find the key, stop the Krang.
translation.es: Aquí vamos. Halla la llave, detén a los Krang.

translation.en: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Easy does it, Leo.
You've got this.
Concentrate.
The whole world is counting on you…
to break the pizza box stack record!
translation.es: para romper el récord de torre de cajas de pizza.

translation.en: One- hundred, twenty- five boxes!
They say it couldn't be done, but look who's doing it, moi.
translation.es: Dicen que no se puede, pero vean quién lo hace: moi.

translation.en: That's Spanish for Leo.
Go ahead, my non- lingual friend, count your unhatched fowl.
translation.es: Adelante, amigo no lingual, canta victoria antes de tiempo.

translation.en: My record stands until you reach the top,
translation.es: Mi récord sigue hasta que llegues a la cima

translation.en: which, according to my calculations of wind speed,
translation.es: y, según mis cálculos de viento,

translation.en: barometric pressure, and dew point, is highly unlikely. What?
translation.es: presión y rocío, es muy poco probable. ¿Qué?

translation.en: According to my calculations,
as long as you believe in yourself, you can do anything!
translation.es: si crees en ti mismo, ¡puedes hacer lo que sea!

translation.en: Thanks, little brother. No one believes in himself more than me.
translation.es: Gracias, hermanito. Nadie cree en sí mismo más que yo.

translation.en: Leo!
Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo!
Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo! Leo!
- Yeah!  I am Leo! - Yeah, baby!
There you are.
I've been looking all over for you guys.
Raph, guess who just broke the record?
What? You did? How many did you--
Stop distracting Raph! We were supposed to be training--
Ta- ta- ta- ta- ta. Hold that thought.
Donnie?
Donnie?
You, sir, have bested me. Mazel.
translation.es: Usted, señor, me ha superado. Mazel.

translation.en: Leo. Leo.
Leo! Leo!
Stop it!
Leo, we have work to do, and you dragged him out here for this?
translation.es: Tenemos trabajo y ¿lo trajiste por esto?

translation.en: Training, record- breaking. The choice was clear.
translation.es: Entrenamiento, récord. La elección estaba clara.

translation.en: Dang it, Leo. Everything's not about you.
translation.es: Maldición, Leo. No todo se trata de ti.

translation.en: When are you gonna grow up and start acting like a hero?
And there it is. Gentlemen…
- What was that? What are you guys doing? - A little game I invented.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hacen? - Un pequeño juego que inventé.

translation.en: Every time you say heroes, we take a bite of pizza.
translation.es: Cada vez que dices héroes, comemos pizza.

translation.en: I don't say heroes that often!
Leo!
So what if I say he-- that word a lot.
translation.es: ¿Y qué si digo… esa palabra seguido?

translation.en: It's a good word. We need to be that word.
translation.es: Es buena. Debemos ser esa palabra.

translation.en: Relax, Raph. We've got this hero thing wired.
translation.es: Relájate, Rapha. Tenemos esto del héroe.

translation.en: I mean, our ninjocity is off the charts.
We've got some kickin' mystic weapons.
And do I need to remind you who has four shells and defeated the Shredder?
translation.es: ¿Y quiénes tienen cuatro caparazones y vencieron a Destructor?

translation.en: - Hey. - Leo!
You just don't get it.
- - Huh? What is all that-- That's me.
Looks like we have a 317- 39.4 in progress!
translation.es: Parece que hay un 317-39.4 en progreso.

translation.en: Oh, come on!
Has nobody read Donnie's Big Book of Bad Guy Codes? Nobody?
translation.es: ¿Nadie leyó el libro de códigos de Donnie?

translation.en: - Nope. - Never gonna happen.
We did it! We got the whatcha- ma- hoosie- doodle!
Of course we did.
Nothing can stop Supervillain Warren Stone
translation.es: Nada detiene al supervillano Warren Stone

translation.en: and his conjuring compatriot, Hypno- Potamus!
There they are! Okay, here's the plan--
Raph, relax. Who needs a plan when we got crazy cool mystic powers?
translation.es: ¿Quién necesita un plan con poderes místicos geniales?

translation.en: Leo!
Come on, swords, it's portal time!
I'll see you guys later after I save the day! Buh- buh- bye!
translation.es: Los veré cuando salve el día. ¡Adiós!

translation.en: Stop! We need to work together!
Wellington Sunday! It's those pesky Turtles.
License and registration.
Oh, I'm sorry, mate. I must have left it in my other jacket.
translation.es: Lo siento. Debí dejarlos en mi otra chaqueta.

translation.en: Leo! Ah!
Leo, we're coming.
Don't worry. I got 'em right where I want 'em.
translation.es: Calma. Los tengo donde los quiero.

translation.en: Doesn't look that way to me. Donnie, Mikey, Maneuver 12.
translation.es: No me parece. Donnie, Mikey, maniobra 12.

translation.en: - On it! - Ha!
Whip- o- rama!
Prepare to be Donnie'd by my mystic tech!
Oh boy.
Okay, creeps, hand over the stolen thingy!
Oh no.
That's gotta be what they stole!
I got it!
With those clumsy hands?  No, I got this one.
translation.es: ¿Con esas manos torpes? No, yo lo tengo.

translation.en: Oh, you portal- chopped him!
Portal- chopped, I like it. Maybe my new catchphrase?
translation.es: Portacortar. Me gusta. ¿Será mi nuevo eslogan?

translation.en: Okay, let's see how it fits. You've been portal chopped!
Uh- uh- uh- uh. I'll be taking this.
The Foot Clan?
Finally, after all these centuries, this is ours.
translation.es: Finalmente, después de tantos siglos, esto es nuestro.

translation.en: Yes, well, of course, thanks to us, delivered safe and sound.
translation.es: Sí, gracias a nosotros, entregado sano y salvo.

translation.en: No problemo, partner.
Hey, just quietly, are we partners? We are partners, yeah?
Oh man, that thing must be dangerous if the Foot Clan wants it.
translation.es: Esa cosa debe ser peligrosa si el Clan del Pie la quiere.

translation.en: Ya think?
Huh? What?
I clearly said, I got it. Everybody heard me say, I got it.
translation.es: Dije: Lo tengo. Todo el mundo me oyó decir lo tengo.

translation.en: Yeah, but I got it with style.
translation.es: Sí, pero yo lo tuve con estilo.

translation.en: But you didn't get it!
You lost it, and now we've got a Foot Clan situation, Leo.
translation.es: Lo perdiste y ahora tenemos problemas con el Clan del Pie, Leo.

translation.en: What's it gonna take for you to be serious, Leo?
And end up with a worry line between my eyes like you?
No, no, no, I do not want a Raph chasm.
translation.es: No quiero un cañón de Rapha.

translation.en: Chasm?
You know, valley, gorge, crevasse.
The only reason I have a chasm is I have to worry about you bozos 24/7.
translation.es: Lo tengo porque debo preocuparme por ustedes las 24 horas.

translation.en: You just don't get it, Leo.
I'm the oldest here.
I'm responsible for keeping us safe and making sure we can handle anything that comes our way.
translation.es: Debo mantenernos a salvo y asegurarme de que manejemos bien todo.

translation.en: 'Cause if I don't, you could all end up dead.
translation.es: Porque, si no lo hago, todos podrían terminar muertos.

translation.en: Sorry, I missed that.
Can you repeat everything from… well, everything?
No wonder you always want to train. You really need the practice.
translation.es: Por eso siempre quieres entrenar. Lo necesitas.

translation.en: Let him go, Mikey.
Wait! No!
Boys! Stop this arguing!
But, Dad, Leo keeps--
No more.
You are a team. You are brothers.
And most importantly, you are too loud!
translation.es: Y, lo más importante, ¡son demasiado ruidosos!

translation.en: I cannot hear my TV show!
Tristan finally proposed to Annabelle, but did she say yes?
translation.es: Tristan pidió la mano de Annabelle. ¿Dijo que sí?

translation.en: I don't know because of you!
Be the ninjas I taught you to be,
translation.es: Sean los ninjas que les enseñé.

translation.en: respectful and quiet!
Sorry. Excuse me.
Hey, how am I supposed to find this thing?
So many people.
How am I gonna save them all, Sensei?
I really wish you were here.
Wait, you are!
I just need to find you.
April.
She'll know.
Hi, professor. Do you have a sec?
Are you even in this class?
I'm April O'Neil, journalism major.
I write for the Eastlaird University Daily News.
Maybe I could get some shots of you at the whiteboard for a story?
Oh! Of course.
- - So, uh, what… what should I do?
You know, just write something sciencey.
I actually have the perfect equation for your article.
translation.es: Tengo la ecuación perfecta para su artículo.

translation.en: Now a few where you're staring thoughtfully at your work.
Oh, I always stare intently at my equations.
Especially this one.
You know, I think I should put on my lab coat.
translation.es: Debería ponerme mi bata de laboratorio.

translation.en: - Look at it! - Oh! Okay.
You know, I could probably stare at this equation all day.
translation.es: Podría mirar esta ecuación todo el día.

translation.en: This is April O'Neil, investigative reporter, Eastlaird University Daily News.
translation.es: April O'Neil, reportera de la Universidad Eastlaird.

translation.en: For years, this college shot down rumors that a foreign government
translation.es: Hace años niegan que otro gobierno

translation.en: is paying them millions to develop a super- toxic herbicidal deforestation bomb.
translation.es: les da millones para una bomba de deforestación.

translation.en: Those rumors end today because I'm about to blow the lid off Big Chem.
translation.es: Se acabó. Estoy por exponer a esta corporación.

translation.en: April O'Neil.
- Ooh. This stuff looks nasty. -
- Hey! Who's there? -
Evidence, baby.
Oh boy.
Well, it's a good thing video ain't the only thing I took.
translation.es: Es bueno que el video no sea lo único que me llevé.

translation.en: April! Yes!
- Commander O'Neil-- - Catlike reflex!
What's the matter with you, creeping up on a person in the dark?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te acercas así en la oscuridad?

translation.en: What the…
And then I saw that picture and I brought him here.
translation.es: Y vi esa foto y lo traje aquí.

translation.en: Sensei?
It's you!
It's all of you! Together!
I never thought I'd see you again! I'm so happy I could hug you!
translation.es: ¡Ya no creí verlos! ¡Podría abrazarlos de felicidad!

translation.en: Who are you, and why do you have a picture of us?
translation.es: ¿Quién eres y por qué tienes nuestra foto?

translation.en: Yeah, who took this? 'Cause I look great.
What's your favorite pizza? 'Cause I'm ordering right now.
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu pizza favorita? Porque estoy por pedir.

translation.en: And why are you wearing genius- built apparel?
translation.es: ¿Y la ropa hecha por un genio?

translation.en: That's trademarked!
Grappling hook!
What's going on?
- He's trying to escape! -
- Want me to knock him out again? - Let me.
Donnie? Donnie!
Oh, okay.
Wa… Wait, stop! I'm a friend. Let me explain.
Let's start over.
My name is Casey Jones, and the reason I have this photo and your tech is because you gave it to me,
translation.es: Soy Casey Jones y tengo esta foto y su tecnología porque me la dieron,

translation.en: but not yet, because I'm from…
the future!
This isn't a joke.
Please, if time travel is possible, future Donnie would have come back
translation.es: De poder viajar al pasado, mi yo del futuro habría vuelto a darme números de lotería como planeamos.

translation.en: and already given me all the lottery numbers like we planned.
translation.es: mi yo del futuro habría vuelto a darme números de lotería como planeamos.

translation.en: It's true. I need you to believe me. Humanity depends on it.
translation.es: Deben creerme. La humanidad depende de eso.

translation.en: In the future, an alien race decimated the planet.
translation.es: En el futuro, alienígenas diezmaron el planeta.

translation.en: We were hunted. We lived in caves. We ate leaves and rats.
translation.es: Nos cazaban, vivíamos en cuevas, comíamos hojas y ratas.

translation.en: No offense.
None taken. We are delicious.
I know how this sounds, but Master Leonardo gave me a mission.
translation.es: Sé cómo suena, pero el maestro Leonardo me dio una misión.

translation.en: I do like how he calls me Master.
translation.es: Me gusta cómo me llama maestro.

translation.en: Of course I do.
You are the greatest ninja the world has ever seen.
translation.es: Eres el mejor ninja que el mundo haya visto.

translation.en: You told me to find the key and stop the Krang.
translation.es: Debo hallar la llave y parar a los Krang.

translation.en: Aliens. Pfft.
Sure. This story just keeps getting better.
Splints?
The Krang?
I have heard that name.
Powerful, barbaric creatures worshiped by the Foot Clan.
translation.es: Criaturas poderosas y bárbaras adoradas por el Clan del Pie.

translation.en: Legend says they came from the stars.
translation.es: Se dice que vinieron de estrellas.

translation.en: Ruthless, unmerciful, with one desire,
translation.es: Implacables, despiadados, con un solo deseo:

translation.en: to enslave our world like so many before us.
translation.es: esclavizar nuestro mundo como hicieron con tantos.

translation.en: All seemed lost,
until great mystic warriors forged a mighty weapon,
translation.es: hasta que guerreros místicos forjaron un arma:

translation.en: a key that was used to lock them in a prison dimension beyond this realm.
translation.es: una llave para encerrarlos en una prisión de otra dimensión.

translation.en: Over the centuries, the mystic key remained hidden
translation.es: Por siglos, la llave estuvo oculta para proteger a la humanidad

translation.en: to protect humankind and prevent the return of the Krang.
translation.es: Por siglos, la llave estuvo oculta para proteger a la humanidad y evitar el regreso de los Krang.

translation.en: So…
Future boy is really from the future?
translation.es: ¿El chico del futuro es del futuro?

translation.en: Mind…
Someone finds the key! Today!
They steal it and use it to open a doorway and free the Krang!
translation.es: ¡La roban, abren un portal y los liberan!

translation.en: That's why I came back, to find it first.
Master Leonardo drew a picture on the back of that photo.
translation.es: Leonardo la dibujó tras esa foto.

translation.en: So to stop the Krang, all we have to do is find the key before it's stolen.
translation.es: Para detenerlos, debemos hallarla antes de que la roben.

translation.en: What?
Yeah, did future handsome, amazing me tell you what to do in case that already happened?
translation.es: ¿El increíble yo del futuro te dijo qué hacer si eso ya sucedió?

translation.en: 'Cause that already happened.
Oh no, we're too late!
No, we're not.
'Cause we know who has the key, the Foot Clan.
translation.es: Sabemos que la tiene el Clan del Pie.

translation.en: Okay, we gotta find them before they use it,
and this time, we do it together!
translation.es: Y, esta vez, lo haremos juntos.

translation.en: Uh, can someone untie me now?
Villain to villain, your hideout is a bit… lacking.
translation.es: De villano a villano, su escondite es un poco... escaso.

translation.en: Might I suggest some velvet, a fireplace, maybe a fuzzy white cat with a diamond necklace?
translation.es: ¿Puedo sugerir terciopelo, chimenea, un gato blanco con collar de diamantes?

translation.en: Tonight, we liberate our masters from their dimensional prison.
translation.es: Esta noche, liberamos a nuestros amos de su prisión.

translation.en: With this key,
we shall free them to lay waste to this world and enslave its people.
translation.es: los liberaremos para devastar este mundo y esclavizar a su gente.

translation.en: Ah, I thought we were just gonna rob a bank and be, you know, crime buddies.
translation.es: Pensé que íbamos a robar un banco y ser amigos criminales

translation.en: We shall follow the Krang as they lead the Foot Clan to glory!
translation.es: ¡Los seguiremos y guiarán al Clan del Pie a la gloria!

translation.en: - Bored. -
You!
- Leo! - What?
I was waiting for a good spot to jump in, but they just kept blabbity- blab- ing.
translation.es: Esperaba cuándo interrumpir, pero seguían hablando tonterías.

translation.en: There it is! That's the key.
Get them! Don't let them interfere with the ceremony!
translation.es: ¡Atrápenlos! ¡No dejen que interfieran con la ceremonia!

translation.en: No!
- It started! -
He's unlocking the doorway! We need to get up there right now!
translation.es: ¡Está abriendo el portal! ¡Debemos subir ahí ahora!

translation.en: Casey, go. We've got you covered.
Oh no.
Oh no! They're here!
Then let's make sure their visit's short and sweet.
translation.es: Asegurémonos de que su visita sea corta.

translation.en: I'm finally free!
The people of this planet will pay for what they've done to me.
translation.es: La gente de este planeta pagará por lo que me hicieron.

translation.en: Welcome to Earth. I hope you don't enjoy your stay!
Enough tricks!
Mikey! Donnie! No!
No…
Raph, what happened to our powers?
They… They're gone.
What did they do to us?
Brother, sister, join me.
Time for us to finish remaking this universe in the image of Krang.
translation.es: Hora de terminar de rehacer este universo a la imagen de los Krang.

translation.en: How I've waited for this day.
Indeed.
Brother, widen the portal and retrieve our ship, the Technodrome.
translation.es: Hermano, ensancha el portal y recupera nuestra nave, el Tecnódromo.

translation.en: Once it is here, this world will kneel before us.
translation.es: Cuando esté aquí, este mundo se arrodillará ante nosotros.

translation.en: Oh, if you two don't mind, I haven't killed anything in ages.
translation.es: Si no les importa, hace eras que no mato nada.

translation.en: Hot soup!
No!
Retreat!
Retreat? We don't retreat!
Leo, for once, listen to me. They're too powerful and Dad's hurt.
translation.es: Óyeme una vez. Son muy poderosos y papá está herido.

translation.en: You don't understand.
If we don't close that doorway, it's only gonna get worse.
translation.es: Si no lo cerramos, solo empeorará.

translation.en: Raph?
I'm not gonna argue with you, Leo! Donnie, escape pods, now!
You don't have to tell me twice!
Sensei, we need to get that key!
- - Leo!
Raph?
Raph, wait, no.
Wait, Raph! Raph! No, Raph! Raph! No, Raph!
Escape pods incoming.
Congratulations on surviving, fam.
- Huh? -
Oh, I hate that.
Everyone okay? Anybody hurt?
How did we get here?
Donnie pods. We've never had to use those before.
translation.es: Cápsulas de Donnie. Nunca las usamos.

translation.en: So, how would everyone rate their escape experience?
Very satisfied, Very, very satisfied, Extremely satisfied?
- Donnie! - Sorry. Sorry.
Data collection calms me down.
Splints.
This is terrible! Why did we leave?
In case you didn't notice, we were getting our butts kicked!
translation.es: Si no viste, ¡nos estaban pateando el trasero!

translation.en: - - But my mission was to stop them!
Now, the Krang are using that key to bring in something that will destroy the world.
translation.es: Ahora usan esa llave para traer algo que destruirá el mundo.

translation.en: We lost.
- Where's my other pod? - Where's Raph?
Ah, did you know this would happen? Why didn't you tell me?
- What are you talking about? - Easy!
- Leo, what's going on? Where's Raph? - Leo, what happened to Raph?
translation.es: - Leo, ¿dónde está Rapha? - ¿Qué le pasó a Rapha?

translation.en: Leonardo?
They…
They got him.
You left Raph?
He left himself.
He used his pod to save me, all because I went after this stupid thing.
translation.es: Usó su cápsula para salvarme porque fui tras esta cosa.

translation.en: You got it! Nice.
Nice? They captured Raph!
He's from the future! He knew this would happen!
No, I didn't. This didn't happen in my time.
translation.es: No. Esto no pasó en mi época.

translation.en: We changed the past, and you got the key.
translation.es: Cambiamos el pasado y tienen la llave.

translation.en: That means there's still a chance to stop them.
- No, we have to save Raph. Come on. - Leo, wait.
translation.es: - No, debemos salvar a Rapha. - Espera.

translation.en: If you won't come, I'll go myself.
- We've lost our mystic powers. - We don't have a plan!
We don't need a plan.
I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen, his words.
translation.es: Dijo que soy el mejor ninja del mundo.

translation.en: Shouldn't we talk about this before we run off all half- cocked, willy- nilly, pell- mell?
translation.es: ¿No debemos hablarlo antes de irnos a medias?

translation.en: I keep being told I'm doing this hero thing wrong.
translation.es: Siempre dicen que hago mal lo del héroe.

translation.en: But I got the key, didn't I?
I get results, so now we're doing it my way.
translation.es: Obtengo resultados. Lo haremos a mi manera.

translation.en: My son, listen to your team.
translation.es: Hijo mío, escucha a tu equipo.

translation.en: This is not about you.
They made it about me when they took my brother.
translation.es: Sí, se llevaron a mi hermano.

translation.en: Trust me, I got this.
Donnie, you're driving.
What do we do with this?
We can't just bring it with us, but we can't just leave it behind.
translation.es: No podemos llevarla, pero no podemos dejarla.

translation.en: Then we should destroy it.
Splints and I will stay here and take care of business.
Thanks, Commander O'Neil.
Commander? I like the sound of that.
Oh, look at it.
- - Disgusting.
- - Try looking in a mirror.
Ugh, it's talking at me.
I'm going to rip out its tongue.
Forgive my sister.
She's got a bit of a temper.
And being in prison for a thousand years hasn't done her any favors.
translation.es: Y estar en prisión mil años no la ayudó.

translation.en: You're not human.
What are you?
Let me go, and I'll show you.
You're more powerful than the people of this planet,
translation.es: Eres más poderoso que la gente del planeta,

translation.en: yet you defend them.
- Why? - It's my duty.
A word used by the weak.
translation.es: Una palabra que usan los débiles.

translation.en: Many planets before yours have spoken of duty.
translation.es: Muchos planetas antes hablaron del deber.

translation.en: They too have been consumed by the Krang.
And now our glorious crusade continues
translation.es: Y, ahora, nuestra gloriosa cruzada continúa

translation.en: to restore the natural order of things.
translation.es: para restaurar el orden natural de las cosas.

translation.en: The strong will devour the weak.
Last I checked, we weren't the ones locked in a prison dimension for a thousand years.
translation.es: Según recuerdo, no estuvimos en una prisión mil años.

translation.en: That's called trash talk.
A rare misstep.
Once I retrieve the key from your comrades,
translation.es: Cuando les quite la llave a tus amigos,

translation.en: I will bring forth the mighty Technodrome,
and you will witness the true power of the Krang.
translation.es: y serán testigos del verdadero poder de los Krang.

translation.en: Now, where have they taken my key?
It won't tell you anything.
Let me kill it.
Lady brain face here is right. I'm not telling you jack.
translation.es: La cara de cerebro tiene razón. No te diré nada.

translation.en: You don't have to tell me.
I'll look myself.
There it is.
They always do it the hard way.
Our brother and I will secure a location for the dimensional doorway.
translation.es: Nuestro hermano y yo aseguraremos la ubicación de la puerta dimensional.

translation.en: Take these soldiers and retrieve me my key.
translation.es: Toma a estos soldados y tráeme mi llave.

translation.en: We live to serve.
You will serve me whether you live or not.
What is this thing?
Hold on to your gluteus maximi!
The Turtle Tank, baby! It's how we roll in the past.
translation.es: ¡El Tortu-tanque! Así lo hacemos en el pasado.

translation.en: I mean, the present. I mean…
- Ugh! Time travel's confusing. - They're on the move.
translation.es: - El viaje en el tiempo es confuso. - Se mueven.

translation.en: According to the subcutaneous tracker I put on Raph--
translation.es: Por el rastreador que puse a Rapha…

translation.en: Wait, does that mean you put trackers on all of us?
No?
No, of course I did… n't.
Based on their trajectory, they're headed…
…to the tallest building in the city.
That's right, Metro Tower.
I heard the story so many times as a kid, but I never thought…
translation.es: Oí la historia muchas veces, pero nunca creí…

translation.en: And behold,
from their perch atop New York City, the Krang ripped open the sky itself.
translation.es: desde lo alto de Nueva York, los Krang rasgaron el cielo.

translation.en: What came out was terror, and what rained down upon us was worse than death.
translation.es: Lo que salió fue terror y llovió algo peor que la muerte.

translation.en: They told that to kids?
Man, the future is harsh.
I'm not gonna let that happen.
We need to get into Metro Tower without being spotted.
translation.es: Debemos entrar sin que nos vean.

translation.en: We'll take the subway tunnels.
Subway tunnels don't offer much in the way of an escape if we need it.
translation.es: No ofrecen mucho escape si lo necesitamos.

translation.en: - Are you sure about this? - Yeah, maybe we should--
Guys, we're doing it my way. Remember?
Prepare the site so we may bring forth the Technodrome.
translation.es: Preparen el lugar para que podamos traer el Tecnódromo.

translation.en: Yes, brother.
See? Smooth sailing. We'll have Raph in no time.
I hope he's okay.
How are we gonna find him once we get there?
I have a lot of questions regarding once we get there.
translation.es: Tengo muchas preguntas sobre al llegar.

translation.en: Relax. We'll do what we always do. Ninja in, ninja their faces, ninja out.
translation.es: Calma. Haremos lo de siempre. Entrar, ser ninjas y salir.

translation.en: That's exactly how you freed all those families from the Krang labor camp.
translation.es: Así liberaste a las familias del campo de trabajo Krang.

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds like me.
In the future, you guys are beyond amazing.
translation.es: En el futuro, son más que increíbles.

translation.en: The mystic powers you're able to harness are on a whole other level.
translation.es: Sus poderes místicos están en otro nivel.

translation.en: Of course! What about my future?
I'm expecting big things for me.
How many Nobel prizes do I have? Don't tell me. I wanna be surprised.
translation.es: ¿Cuántos Nobel tengo? No. Que me sorprendan.

translation.en: Donnie, you were the most brilliant, innovative mind of all time.
translation.es: Fuiste la mente más brillante e innovadora de todos los tiempos.

translation.en: I'm shocked, I am. Go on, continue to meet my expectations.
translation.es: Qué sorpresa. Sigue cumpliendo mis expectativas.

translation.en: What do I do in the future?
You are the most powerful mystic warrior the world has ever known.
translation.es: El guerrero místico más poderoso que se haya conocido.

translation.en: With those two hands, you sent me back in time.
translation.es: Con estas dos manos, me enviaste al pasado.

translation.en: Actually, there is something I should tell you.
translation.es: De hecho, hay algo que debería decirles.

translation.en: Auto brake engaged.
Think we're in the right place?
Looks like the Metro Tower station is on the other side of those vines.
translation.es: Parece que la estación está tras esas enredaderas.

translation.en: Great. Let's hoof it.
Through the disgusting, drippy slime jungle?
translation.es: ¿A través de la asquerosa jungla de baba?

translation.en: I know. I know. Leo knows best,
but I'm not sharing my hand sanitizer.
Feeling a lack of rush in this rush hour, right?
translation.es: Sienten la falta de pico en esta hora pico, ¿no?

translation.en: I don't know, Leo. Something feels…
off.
Don't worry. I won't let us die. I'm a mystic warrior.
translation.es: Calma. No dejaré que muramos. Soy un guerrero místico.

translation.en: I feel better already, he said without a hint of sarcasm.
translation.es: Ya me siento mejor, dijo sin sarcasmo.

translation.en: Look, the stairs.
Sneaking in from below was the right move. Those slimeballs will never see us coming.
translation.es: Ir por abajo fue correcto. Las bolas de baba no nos verán venir.

translation.en: We tried to jackhammer it, flamethrower it, pour acid on it…
translation.es: Probamos con un martillo, un lanzallamas, ácido…

translation.en: I thought lasers cut everything! How did that not work?
translation.es: Creí que el láser cortaba todo y no funcionó.

translation.en: There's not even a scratch!
Maybe it was your aim.
Maybe your big rat head got in the way!
translation.es: ¡O tu cabeza de rata me distrajo!

translation.en: Mmm, I'll show you, fat rat head.
Okay, deep breaths.
You said some things, I said some things.
Maybe we should just get back to saving the world.
What's next?
This cannot be good.
April O'Neil!
Come back here!
- - Faster.
Faster!
I knew this was a bad idea.
Leo, there's too many. We should go back.
No, we're gonna get to those stairs.
Leo, we're not gonna make it! We have to turn back.
We push forward, get Raph, that's final.
Mystic hands!
Donnie! Mikey!
Oh no, Donnie, your soft shell! You're exposed!
We gotta find shelter!
Oh, oh, keep it down, Vomitello!
Oh. Keep it down, daddy!
Run, insects, but you can't escape!
Don't!
The key, human! Give it to me!
What did you do to me? What did you do to my face?
translation.es: ¿Qué me hiciste? ¿Qué le hiciste a mi cara?

translation.en: I knew that stuff was nasty! I told y'all!
Yes, yes, you're a genius. Let's go.
Donnie, come in.
They found us. Where should we go? Donnie?
We're trapped.
We are trapped in the subway under Metro Tower.
The tank is running on emergency power and is covered in some kind of Krang bio- growth.
translation.es: El tanque usa energía de emergencia y lo cubre una cosa Krang.

translation.en: - I repeat-- - April, come quick!
We're getting squished!
We're on our way!
But, April, how will we get them out?
I've got an idea.
Yeesh. Remind me to never get on your bad side.
Casey!
Casey, you okay?
Donnie, Mikey, anybody?
What the heck was that?
Some kind of drippy, crazy Krang monster.
translation.es: Un monstruo Krang chorreante y loco.

translation.en: No, I mean you! Why weren't you listening to anybody?
translation.es: ¡No, tú! ¿Por qué no oíste a nadie?

translation.en: Because I was trying to get us into the building!
That sure worked out well.
I was doing everything right. How could it go wrong?
Because you weren't listening to your team!
You don't have all the answers all the time!
I'm the greatest ninja the world's ever seen. You said that.
translation.es: El mejor ninja del mundo. Dijiste eso.

translation.en: I was wrong.
What?
You're impulsive, you're arrogant,
and you don't see that every decision you make could cost someone their life.
translation.es: y no ves que cada decisión que tomas puede costar una vida.

translation.en: You want to know what really happens to your brothers in the future?
They die. Everybody dies fighting the Krang.
translation.es: Todos mueren luchando contra los Krang.

translation.en: The world needs Master Leonardo.
And all we got is this guy.
translation.es: Y solo tenemos a este tipo.

translation.en: We have an update on the strange situation at Metro Tower.
translation.es: Hay información sobre la situación en Metro Tower.

translation.en: All contact has been lost with those inside the building,
translation.es: Se perdió contacto con la gente dentro

translation.en: and conflicting reports suggest
something is barricading entrance for emergency personnel.
translation.es: que algo bloquea la entrada a las autoridades.

translation.en: Fools.
These creatures should welcome the power of the Krang.
translation.es: Deberían recibir alegres el poder de los Krang.

translation.en: You on the rooftop! Stop and surrender immediately!
We've got eyes on the roof top where the police are confronting--
translation.es: Vemos el techo, donde la policía enfrenta…

translation.en: What is that?
You may begin.
Look out!
- - Look,
I know I'm not the Leo you knew in the future, and maybe I never will be.
translation.es: no soy el Leo del futuro y quizá nunca lo sea.

translation.en: This whole time I was sure my family needed me,
but the truth is I need them.
translation.es: pero yo los necesito a ellos.

translation.en: If we're gonna survive this, we have to do it together.
translation.es: Y si sobreviviremos, debe ser juntos.

translation.en: Hull integrity, 4%. Breach imminent. Good luck.
translation.es: Integridad del casco: 4 %. Intrusión inminente. Buena suerte.

translation.en: Whew, good. We have an imminent amount of time.
Imminent means soon, Mikey.
Don't worry. I'll save us with my mystic hands.
translation.es: Calma. Nos salvaré con mis manos místicas.

translation.en: Casey must have been wrong about me.
This is it, Donnie.
We're gonna get crushed!
- Knock- knock! - April?
Anyone order a rescue?
Boom goes the herbicide!
April!
You saved us!
Uncomfortable with emotion!
Where is Leo? And, uh, Future Boy?
Somewhere in there.
Faster! They're this way.
I can smell them.
- - She found us! We gotta move now.
Oh man, is this what the future looks like?
translation.es: Cielos. ¿Así es como luce el futuro?

translation.en: Nope, the future is worse. Much worse.
translation.es: No, el futuro es peor. Mucho peor.

translation.en: Donnie, Mikey, do you read me?
Come in, Leo.
Donnie, where are you?
We've extracted from the subway and are ascending a staircase.
translation.es: Ya fuera del metro en una escalera.

translation.en: I'm getting a lot of interference, but if you hold still, I can triangulate your position using a complex geo- location algorithm.
translation.es: Hay interferencia, pero estén quietos y los ubicaré con un complejo algoritmo.

translation.en: - Uh, Donnie? - Odd numbers, primes, no… almost.
- Almost! -
Ugh. I never get to use my algorithm.
Man, I am so glad you guys aren't dead.
translation.es: Me alegra que no estén muertos.

translation.en: Ditto.
Okay, before this gets too mushy, we need to locate Raph.
translation.es: Antes de la sensiblería, busquemos a Rapha.

translation.en: Can you tell me if he's in the building?
Bet your momma's subatomic particles I can.
translation.es: Por las partículas de tu mamá.

translation.en: Got him! He's close.
He's almost on top of us.
Wait, he is on top of us.
Raph!
Quick, cut him down, get him out of there.
Hang on. We got you. Almost there.
Raph?
Surprise.
What did you do to my brother?
Improved him.
Thank you for this. We will be putting it to good use.
translation.es: Gracias por esto. Le daremos un buen uso.

translation.en: Come, the world awaits destruction.
translation.es: Vamos, el mundo espera su destrucción.

translation.en: Tear them apart!
We gotta move.
- Leo, move!  - No!
A shame our brethren didn't survive the prison dimension.
translation.es: Qué mal que nuestros hermanos no sobrevivieran en prisión.

translation.en: Then again, their weakness has no place in my new Krang empire.
translation.es: Por otra parte, su debilidad no tiene lugar en mi nuevo imperio Krang.

translation.en: Open and bring unto this world the mighty power of Krang!
translation.es: ¡Ábrete y trae a este mundo el gran poder de los Krang!

translation.en: Warning! This is a warning!
…appears to be something falling from the sky--
translation.es: Parece que algo cae del cielo…

translation.en: What?
Begin!
What do we do now?
I fear we are lost. The Krang are too powerful.
translation.es: Temo que estamos perdidos. Los Krang son demasiado poderosos.

translation.en: Maybe we could change the future some other way.
Guys, it's time to face facts. We can't change the future.
translation.es: Hora de enfrentar los hechos. No podemos cambiar el futuro.

translation.en: Says who?
Says the grandfather paradox, says physical determinism,
translation.es: La paradoja del abuelo, la física,

translation.en: says the space- time continuum.
Look, I didn't want it to be true, but…
translation.es: No quería que fuera verdad, pero…

translation.en: …science.
That's it! Donnie's wrong.
The world is ending, yet the barbs continue.
translation.es: El mundo se acaba, las burlas siguen.

translation.en: Don't you remember? We already did change the future.
translation.es: ¿No lo recuerdan? Ya cambiamos el futuro.

translation.en: Raph never got kidnapped and turned into a Krang zombie in your time.
translation.es: Rapha no había sido secuestrado y hecho zombi.

translation.en: - Right, Casey? - No, he didn't.
That means we did change the future! We're just in a different…
translation.es: ¡Cambiamos el futuro! Estamos en una diferente…

translation.en: Bifurcated time branch?
Yes, yes, yes, that nerd thing.
You know what that means, right? We still have hope!
A ninja's greatest weapon.
translation.es: La mejor arma de un ninja.

translation.en: Hey, I like that!
Look, I'm done thinking I have all the answers.
translation.es: Ya me cansé de pensar que sé todo.

translation.en: I don't know how to beat the Krang,
but I do know our future isn't written until we write it as a team.
translation.es: pero sí sé que a nuestro futuro lo escribiremos como equipo.

translation.en: So what do we got?
Maybe…
Maybe we don't have to beat them.
Can't we just send them back to the prison dimension?
There's an idea! Donnie, what do those big, beautiful eyebrows have to say?
translation.es: ¡Sí! Donnie, ¿qué dicen tus cejas grandes y hermosas?

translation.en: If we got control of their ship, we could send it back through the portal.
translation.es: Si controlamos su nave, podríamos enviarlos por el portal.

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Now we're cooking. Who else?
If someone on the ground can get to that key…
translation.es: Si uno llega a esa llave…

translation.en: We can close the doorway.
And then bye- bye Krang forever, baby!
translation.es: Y adiós para siempre a los Krang.

translation.en: Exactly. What do you say, Donnie? You ready to fly a space ship?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Qué dices, Donnie? ¿Listo para volar una nave espacial?

translation.en: Literally the greatest question I have ever been asked.
translation.es: Es la mejor pregunta que me han hecho.

translation.en: All right, team, we have a plan. Let's go save the world.
translation.es: Equipo, tenemos un plan. A salvar el mundo.

translation.en: Wait, but what about Raph?
That big jerk may be covered in goo and half alien,
translation.es: Estará baboso y será mitad alienígena,

translation.en: but he's still our brother, and I'm not giving up on him.
translation.es: pero es nuestro hermano y no me rendiré.

translation.en: I'm not leaving him behind.
There's the key. Let's go.
Like Casey said, let's go!
I wish my tech was working!
Usually, my cardio is jetpack- assisted.
I'm not getting credit for any of these steps!
Hey, question, is it too late to join April's team?
translation.es: ¿Es tarde para ir al equipo de April?

translation.en: You two figure out how to hijack this ship.
I'm gonna find Raph.
So how do we hack this thing?
Best guess, main console?
Unfortunately, it's ocupado.
Uh, new plan.
Run!
Surprise. I've come for my brother.
Let me guess.
Duty.
He said doodie.
I see you got yourself an upgrade.
You'll pay for what you have done to me!
translation.es: Pagarás por lo que me hiciste.

translation.en: This psycho routine is a little thin. Where's the character development?
translation.es: Esta rutina es mala. ¿Y el desarrollo del personaje?

translation.en: Leo's counting on us to get to that key.
translation.es: Leo espera que obtengamos la llave.

translation.en: I think I have an idea.
Cover me!
Raph, you're coming with me, whether you like it or not.
translation.es: Rapha, vendrás conmigo quieras o no.

translation.en: I don't want to fight you, but I will if I have to.
translation.es: No quiero pelear, pero lo haré si debo.

translation.en: Oh, you will have to.
Bravo, Mikey!
There's no buttons, or computers, or anything.
Just a lot of drippy, ooey- gooey disgustingness.
I don't know how to hack in…
Oh God, I know what I have to do.
translation.es: Ya sé qué tengo que hacer.

translation.en: What?
No, I don't think I can do this.
- What are you talking about? -
Oh no!
That's…  …so gross!
- I can't do it. - I believe in you!
- No, it's my worst nightmare. - I know.
translation.es: - Es mi peor pesadilla. - Lo sé.

translation.en: I'm doing it! I'm doing it!
Raph, I know you're in there somewhere. You've gotta snap out of this!
translation.es: Rapha, sé que estás ahí. ¡Debes reaccionar!

translation.en: Do you feel what the power of the Krang can do?
translation.es: ¿Sientes lo que hace el poder Krang?

translation.en: I am saving this weak planet!
I am a gift!
It's not working. I need more of a connection.
Mikey, take off my battle shell.
No, you're too vulnerable with just your soft shell.
translation.es: No, eres vulnerable con el blando.

translation.en: There's no time, hurry.
Donnie?
Mikey, I am…
a spaceship!
I'm trying to save you, you idiot!
Why do you have to make things so hard?
You want to keep coming at me? Go ahead. I'm done fighting you.
translation.es: ¿Quieres seguir? Hazlo. Me cansé de pelear contigo.

translation.en: What?
No!
Finally, man and machine
translation.es: Finalmente, el hombre y la máquina

translation.en: entwixed in perfect bionic synergy!
translation.es: se entrelazaron en perfecta sinergia biónica.

translation.en: How dare you desecrate Krang's ship!
translation.es: ¿Cómo se atreven a profanar la nave de los Krang?

translation.en: Donnie, Mikey!
I don't want to fight anymore.
I was fighting you because I didn't understand you,
but now I get it.
I always figured you were mad because you didn't like the way I did things.
translation.es: Siempre te creí enojado por cómo hacía las cosas.

translation.en: But when I see what's happening to you,
translation.es: Pero cuando vi lo que te pasa

translation.en: and what's happening to them…
I realized it wasn't about me.
translation.es: supe que no se trataba de mí.

translation.en: You didn't yell because you were mad, you yelled because you were scared.
translation.es: No gritabas por estar enojado, gritabas por miedo.

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for the lives you protect.
translation.es: Da miedo ser responsable de vidas.

translation.en: Your team… your family,
but we do it anyway because that's what it means to be a hero.
translation.es: Pero lo hacemos igual, porque eso es ser un héroe.

translation.en: If this is it, I want you to know I finally understand.
translation.es: Si es el fin, quiero que sepas que ya entiendo.

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
Raph, Raph, there you are! Come back! Your family needs you.
- Leo? - Yes!
Mikey, Donnie, we can fight this.
Raph's doing it for us, so we do it for him.
translation.es: Rapha lo hace por nosotros, lo haremos por él.

translation.en: That alien jerkface thinks we're weak
because he hasn't seen what we can do…
translation.es: porque no vio qué podemos hacer

translation.en: when we fight together!
It's pointless to resist Krang.
Give up!
You will be consumed like everyone else on this pathetic planet!
translation.es: ¡Serán consumidos como todos en este patético planeta!

translation.en: - - Fat chance.
We're not like everyone else on this planet.
translation.es: No somos como los demás aquí.

translation.en: We are…
…the Teenage…
- …Mutant… - …Ninja…
…Turtles!
If this isn't the poster shot, someone's getting fired.
translation.es: Si no es la foto del póster, habrá un despido.

translation.en: - - Oh, we are not done yet.
April O'Neil!
That's payback.
Keep her under that building until I bring it down.
translation.es: Manténganla debajo hasta que lo derribe.

translation.en: Yeah!
Casey, get out of there!
Commander O'Neil!
Nice shot.
Donnie's almost got the ship to the other side. I have to get to the key.
translation.es: Donnie casi la lleva al otro lado. Necesito la llave.

translation.en: See ya.
Come in, Sensei, it's Casey. Can you hear me?
Come in, Sensei! Can you hear me?
Okay! Donnie!
Cowabunga!
Flip- o- rama!
Let's roll.
Ka- zoom!
Raph, go.
On it!
Gotcha! Don't worry, Donnie!
This is not a hug. It's a rescue!
translation.es: ¡Esto no es un abrazo, es un rescate!

translation.en: Where are we? Staten Island?
Oh, gross.
So how would everyone rate that rescue experience? Unsatisfied?
Very unsatisfied? Wish Donnie would have done it? Um- hum?
- - Donnie.
Leo's still up there.
Casey. Casey, come in.
Sensei, I'm here. And I've got eyes on the key.
translation.es: Senséi, estoy aquí. Y veo la llave.

translation.en: Tell me when you're home free, and I'll pull the plug.
translation.es: Cuando esté a salvo, la desconectaré.

translation.en: Casey, listen to me.
When I get to the other side, you close that door.
What? Sensei, no!
Casey, it's the only way. He's too strong.
translation.es: Es la única manera. Es muy fuerte.

translation.en: He's not gonna stay on the other side unless I keep him there.
translation.es: No se quedará ahí si no lo retengo.

translation.en: There has to be another way!
We tried everything, Case. This is the only way.
translation.es: Probamos todo. Es la única forma.

translation.en: Leo, please don't do this! Leo!
You're one to talk, big bro. Hero moves are totally your style.
translation.es: Y tú lo dices. Las cosas de héroe son lo tuyo.

translation.en: Outmatched and alone, yet you persist.
translation.es: Superado y solo, e igual persistes.

translation.en: For what?
Honor, redemption?
Sacrifice? All meaningless.
We'll see about that.
Leo, please! I can't lose you again.
translation.es: ¡Por favor! No puedo volver a perderte.

translation.en: Hey, future me would be real proud of you. I'm proud of you.
translation.es: Mi yo del futuro estaría muy orgulloso de ti. Yo lo estoy.

translation.en: Weak words, weak actions.
I have forever known what you fail to understand,
translation.es: Siempre he sabido lo que no entiendes,

translation.en: strength always prevails!
What you fail to understand is I missed on purpose.
translation.es: Lo que no entiendes es que fallé a propósito.

translation.en: No, enough of your little tricks.
Casey, close the portal now.
What?
No! Let go of me!
Casey, please.
You've been portal chopped.
You…
You've ruined everything!
And now…  …my wrath will be reserved for you alone.
translation.es: Y ahora mi ira estará reservada solo para ti.

translation.en: You think you've won, you wretched little pest?
Wipe that grin off your face!
Mikey, it's over.
Leo never gave up on us.
I'm not giving up on him.
Whoa. Mikey, whatever you're doing, don't stop!
translation.es: Mikey, sea lo que sea que haces, no pares.

translation.en: We're here, Mikey. Together.
Took you guys long enough.
Leo!
- Leo? - Hey.
Eww! Are we in Staten Island?
- Come here! - Aww!
No pictures.
So this is grabbing a slice?
I don't get it.
Wait for it.
So much better than rats!
Hey, the rest of the world we saved is pretty great too.
translation.es: El resto del mundo también es genial.

translation.en: All right, everybody, look up here.
April, you just got a message from someone named Cassandra.
translation.es: April, tienes un mensaje de una Cassandra.

translation.en: Looks like our friend Cassandra has been busy.
That's my mom!
There goes the space- time continuum.
- - You did it, little brother.
You really did it.
I'm proud of you.
This wasn't about me.
It was about all of us doing what needed to be done
translation.es: sino de que todos hiciéramos lo necesario.

translation.en: because we're heroes.
You said heroes.
There it is, gentlemen, our home.
What a town.
Beautiful.
And if it needs defending, we'll always rise to the challenge.
translation.es: Y si hay que defenderla, enfrentaremos el desafío.

translation.en: Speaking of which, you know what challenge I'm gonna rise to?
translation.es: Hablando de eso, ¿sabes qué desafío enfrentaré?

translation.en: - Beating that record! - Yay!
No way! No, okay, fine.
All right, Big Raphie, let's do it!
Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph! Raph!
